ValidationRule.description: The Title, Description, and Topic are required when requesting a moderator.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Request_Moderator__c), Request_Moderator__c = True, OR( Title__c = "", ISBLANK(Topic__c), Paper_Description__c = "" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Title, Description, and Topic are required when requesting a moderator.
